column5: Well I had to do it.  I hit a local pond this morning (off the dock) in search of some first ice crappies.  All I found were a couple of largemouth that came into the Vexilar screen like a rocket and smoked that little jig..  Did it ever feel great pulling the ice fishing equipment out.  Great day!  Cheers
Hey iceslayer - congrats on the first ice fish.  It's a shame about all the no fishing signs around the docks/ice i posted yesterday - I'd be out trying to du0plicate your luck.
Die hard good going season is around the bend.
Nicely done!  Way to be creative and use the dock

WOOOOHOOOOOO! Excellent work Slayer....1st ice report....i'm overjoyed and jealous as hell....mmmmmmmmmmm....watching fish on screen through the ice.....absolutely fantastic!  i have lterally walked up from the ice ....inched my way out....i'm gonna take the auger down in a minute....see how much ice there is....lol...if ya dont here from me again...no i wont say it.   Top bit of improvisation there...off the dock...through the ice...stunning effort...and some fish to boot...did i say i was jealous?...lol...i think i did.   I'm gonna tie a rope round the tree....then round me.....ice picks at the ready...pdf firmly attached to me too...spud bar...well actually...not a spud bar but  a random metal bar i had lying around...off i go.   Great report  thanks for sharing.
nice, wtg. too bad you didn't get any crappie.

even though hunting is occupiing most of energy these days , i am definitely in the ice -day count-down . i'm very jealous . you have already iced your first fish. ,, incredible.    nice surprise those bass were ,no doubt?   pullin' pretty hard , nice slabs ,you were thinkin'. eh? a lot of fun on 1st ice ,,congrat's.    nothin' like a decent strike through the ice .   great stuff,, thanks for sharin'.
Great report and pics iceslayer  First ice report congratulation And you got into some fish      WTG Thanks for sharing Leechman

right on! I just checked out a local pond on my way home from work and it was iced over too. Only has snot-rocket pike in it, but for some reason I don't have an issue targetting dink pike if its through the ice. I just love watching that orange flag waving . couple more weeks and I'll give it a go
that's awesome...looks like you just punched a whole through the ice with your boot !!!

That's awesome!  Sorry I was busy yesterday & couldn't make it out!  But we'll for sure have to get together sometime soon!    A few of us are headin out for some Steelies tomorrow mornin!! How's the foot?

Foots doing better.  Still in the cast though.  So I can get around.  Just slowly.  Im gonna head back there tomorrow morning early.  This pond only produces crappie early in the morning and just before dark.  Just gett'n ice fishin was a hell of a treat, but I want a nice crappie lunch.  Cheers
Not too often you can go ice fishing for largies legally! Good stuff! Looks like we may have plenty of ice on the ponds before Christmas. Let's keep our fingers crossed!
